history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 1 use: RiemannInt_P10. qsimpl time: 1 use: RiemannInt_P10. qsimpl time: 1 use: RiemannInt_P10,Riemann_integrable_scal. qsimpl time: 1 use: RiemannInt_P10,Riemann_integrable_scal,f,RiemannInt_P13. qsimpl time: 1 use: Riemann_integrable_scal,RiemannInt_P10,RiemannInt_P13,f,RiemannInt_P15. qsimpl time: 1 use: Riemann_integrable_scal,RiemannInt_P10,RiemannInt_P13,f,RiemannInt_P15. srun best use: Rplus_lt_reg_r.

exceptions.tactic: intros f a b c pr_f pr.
assert (pr': Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + (-c + c) * f x) a b).

replace (RiemannInt pr0) with (RiemannInt pr + c * RiemannInt pr_f).

original: intros f a b c pr_f pr. assert (pr': Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + (-c + c) * f x) a b). { apply RiemannInt_P10; auto. } assert (Heq: forall x, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> (fun x => f x + (-c + c) * f x) x = f x). { intros x _; simpl; field. } rewrite (RiemannInt_ext _ _ _ _ pr_f pr') in Heq. rewrite Heq. assert (pr0: Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => c * f x + (-c + c) * f x) a b). { apply Riemann_integrable_scal; auto. } rewrite (RiemannInt_P13 f (fun x => c * f x) a b (-c)) in pr0. rewrite (RiemannInt_P15 a b 0) in pr0. simpl in pr0. replace (RiemannInt pr0) with (RiemannInt pr + c * RiemannInt pr_f). apply RiemannInt_P5 with (pr1 := pr); auto. Field.
